publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2262 Robert Brown: Nursing Shortagesâ€”That the Parliament recognises the nursing shortages in Scotland; notes the extensive use of agency nurses, and believes that the provision of free return-to-practice courses for the estimated 10,000 registered nurses in Scotland who do not nurse currently would make a valuable contribution to the situation.

S1M-2262 Robert Brown: Nursing Shortages-That the Parliament recognises the nursing shortages in Scotland; notes the extensive use of agency nurses, and believes that the provision of free return-to-practice courses for the estimated 10,000 registered nurses in Scotland who do not nurse currently would make a valuable contribution to the situation.
S1M-2262 Nursing Shortages (lodged on 27 September 2001) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2262 Nursing Shortages (lodged on 27 September 2001) Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2262 Nursing Shortages (lodged on 27 September 2001) Robin Harper*
S1M-2262 Nursing Shortages (lodged on 27 September 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2262 Nursing Shortages (lodged on 27 September 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*
